name: replyforce-ai
description: AI-powered social media auto-reply and lead scoring SaaS platform

scripts.install:all: cd packages/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ai-agents && npm install && cd ../workers && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/backend && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.db:push: cd packages/backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.docker:up: docker compose -f infrastructure/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d postgres redis
